# data-access-plugin

> A teraserver plugin for managing data access and searching spaces

## Installation

```bash
# Using yarn
yarn add data-access-plugin
# Using npm
npm install --save data-access-plugin
```

This a package within the [Teraslice](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice) monorepo. See our [documentation](https://terascope.github.io/teraslice/docs/packages/data-access-plugin/overview) for more information or the [issues](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Apkg%2Fdata-access-plugin) associated with this package
